portal.selectPhotos: Select photos or documents to send
portal.invalidFileType: Only images (JPEG, PNG) and PDF accepted
portal.landingMessage: Please use the link sent via SMS to access the portal.
expense.greeting: Hello <1>{{clientName}}</1>! Please fill in your business expenses below.
expense.errorMessage: Please contact the tax office for support.
expense.contactCPA: Please contact your CPA for a new link.
expense.formLockedMessage: CPA has locked this form. Please contact the office if you need to make changes.
expense.travelTooltip: Business travel costs: airfare, hotels, taxi (excluding meals).
expense.travelDescription: Airfare, hotels, taxi, Uber for business
expense.mealsTooltip: Meal expenses with clients or business partners (50% deductible).
expense.mealsDescription: Meals with clients or partners (50% deductible)
expense.suppliesTooltip: Consumable business supplies: tools, materials, office supplies.
expense.carMethodNote: IRS allows only one method (not both)
expense.businessMilesNote: Only business miles (deliveries, client visits...), not commute
expense.actualCarTooltip: Actual car expenses: gas, insurance, repairs, car wash (IF not using mileage rate).
expense.actualCarIncludes: Includes: gas, car insurance, repairs, car wash, parking, tolls
expense.otherExpensesDescription: For other expenses like: equipment, phone, internet, advertising, rent, insurance, etc.
expense.successMessage: Your expense information has been sent to CPA.
expense.cpaReview: CPA will review the information and contact you if additional details are needed.
expense.canEditAnytime: You can edit the information anytime before CPA locks the form.
expense.progress.label: {{filled}} of {{total}} items filled
expense.vehicleInfoNote: Additional information for IRS if claiming car expenses
expense.vehicleUsedForCommute: Was the vehicle used for commuting?
expense.vehicleAnotherAvailable: Do you have another vehicle for personal use?
expense.vehicleEvidenceWritten: Do you have written evidence of business miles?
expense.totalMilesTooltip: Total miles driven for business purposes during the year (deliveries, client visits, work).
expense.validation.cannotSubmit: Unable to submit form. Please try again.
error.boundary.title: An Error Occurred
error.boundary.message: Something went wrong. Please try again or reload the page.
error.expense.title: Display Error
error.expense.message: An error occurred while loading the expense form.
api.error.rateLimited: Too many requests. Please wait a moment.
